game_description: The Walk Through The Music with Poznań Philharmonic Orchestra 34 musicians and a world-class Conductor recorded live in the concert hall with ZYLIA 6 DoF Navigable Audio system. Walkthrough the stage and stand next to any artist. Download the 360-degrees demo for VR goggles and take this immersive journey home where you smoothly navigate through the scene and experience the sound from anyplace – close perspective, the backstage, or the audience. Notice how the sound changes while passing by the musicians. Comments: “The border between the musician and audience was existing for ages. Once you pass this border you are entering a real musical world. This kind of experience is an experience I cannot describe. You have to fill it." Recordings: Poznań Philharmonic Orchestra conducted by Łukasz Borowicz (Principal Guest Conductor Poznań Philharmonic Orchestra). Music: W. A. Mozart - "The Marriage of Figaro", the overture
review_1: As a fan of classical music I would love to see more content to be realized in this app.
review_2: It's worth it to try just for the amazing audio. Close your eyes and move around. It's amazing.
review_3: It is exactly as published. Move about the orchestra and experience incredible spatial audio. If you love music and its intricacies, you will love this. It really showcases the possibilities of VR and audio experiences
